/* req4500DAO.selectReq4500ReqSignList - 요구사항 결재 정보 가져오기 */ SELECT T2.* FROM ( SELECT T.TYPE ,T.PRJ_ID ,T.REQ_ID ,T.REQ_NM ,T.SIGN_ID ,T.PROCESS_ID ,T.SIGN_FLOW_ID ,T.SIGN_FLOW_NM ,T.SIGN_FLOW_TITLE_BG_COLOR ,T.SIGN_FLOW_TITLE_COLOR ,T.SIGN_USR_ID ,( SELECT USR_NM FROM ADM2000 WHERE USR_ID = T.SIGN_USR_ID) AS SIGN_USR_NM ,( SELECT USR_IMG_ID FROM ADM2000 WHERE USR_ID = T.SIGN_USR_ID) AS SIGN_USR_IMG ,T.SIGN_CD ,( SELECT SUB_CD_NM FROM ADM4100 WHERE LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND MST_CD = 'REQ00004' AND SUB_CD = T.SIGN_CD ) AS SIGN_CD_NM ,SF_REPLACE_ALL(T.SIGN_REJECT_CMNT,'
|

' , ' ' ) AS SIGN_REJECT_CMNT ,T.SIGN_DTM ,T.REG_DTM ,T.REG_USR_ID ,( SELECT USR_NM FROM ADM2000 WHERE USR_ID = T.REG_USR_ID) AS REG_USR_NM ,( SELECT USR_IMG_ID FROM ADM2000 WHERE USR_ID = T.REG_USR_ID) AS REG_USR_IMG ,T.REG_USR_IP FROM ( SELECT 'CHK' TYPE ,A.PRJ_ID ,A.REQ_ID ,C.REQ_NM ,A.SIGN_ID ,A.PROCESS_ID ,A.SIGN_FLOW_ID ,B.FLOW_NM AS SIGN_FLOW_NM ,B.FLOW_TITLE_BG_COLOR AS SIGN_FLOW_TITLE_BG_COLOR ,B.FLOW_TITLE_COLOR AS SIGN_FLOW_TITLE_COLOR ,A.SIGN_USR_ID ,A.SIGN_CD ,A.SIGN_REJECT_CMNT ,A.SIGN_DTM ,A.REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID ,A.REG_USR_IP FROM REQ4900 A LEFT JOIN FLW1100 B ON ( A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.PROCESS_ID = B.PROCESS_ID AND A.SIGN_FLOW_ID = B.FLOW_ID) INNER JOIN REQ4100 C ON ( A.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID AND A.REQ_ID = C.REQ_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REG_DTM BETWEEN TO_DATE( #startDt# ,'YYYY-MM-DD' ) AND TO_DATE( #endDt# ,'YYYY-MM-DD' ) +0.99999 AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# ) T ) T2 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T2.SIGN_USR_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTxt# ||'%' ORDER BY T2.REG_DTM DESC
